text: 14.38 Further guidance on how to achieve good design for social interaction in high density environments can be found in the Tower Hamlets High Density Living SPD. 14.39 In relation to part 5(j), proposals involving tall buildings will need to demonstrate how any adverse impacts on the microclimate will be mitigated in relation to wind, overshadowing, daylight and sunlight, solar glare, and light pollution. Buildings over 25 metres in height and/ or substantially taller than surrounding buildings must be tested against the following amended Lawson criteria in relation to wind.
